class.name: BoneAttachment
class.brief_description: A node that will attach to a bone.
class.description: This node must be the child of a [Skeleton] node. You can then select a bone for this node to attach to. The BoneAttachment node will copy the transform of the selected bone.

method.name: get_bone_name
method.description: Returns the name of the bone node attached to.

method.name: set_bone_name
method.description: Changes the name of the bone node
